comments: Exponents e such that x^e + x^2 - 1 is reducible.If Y is a 4-subset of an (2n+1)-set X then, for n>=3, a(n-2) is the number of 3-subsets of X having at least two elements in common with Y. - _Milan Janjic_, Dec 16 2007
formula: A030132(a(n)) = 9. - _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Jul 04 2007a(n) = 24*n - a(n-1) + 8, (with a(0)=10). - _Vincenzo Librandi_, Dec 24 2010
prog: (Sage) [i+10 for i in range(527) if gcd(i,12) == 12] # _Zerinvary Lajos_, May 21 2009
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_
